movie-description: A mockumentary which covers the making of the show South Park in a fictional fashion, apparently spoofing similar such shows, with the creators pretending to be arrogant, obnoxious jerks who are only in it for the money. Not to be taken as a real documentary under any circumstance.
movie-title: Goin' Down to South Park (TV Movie 1999)
movie-short-description: Directed by Richard Spiller.  With Mary Kay Bergman, Martin Cendreda, Giancarlo Ganziano, Isaac Hayes. A mockumentary which covers the making of the show South Park in a fictional fashion, apparently spoofing similar such shows, with the creators pretending to be arrogant, obnoxious jerks who are only in it for the money. Not to be taken as a real documentary under any circumstance.
